name: Js Contact Form
author: Anowar Hossain Rana

sections.description:
Js Contact Form is a lightweight and flexible contact form plugin that supports attachments and offers several customization options. With version 1.1, the plugin introduces a settings page where users can configure their email addresses, customize form labels, apply custom CSS, and more.

Features:

ðŸš€ Introducing Js Contact Form 1.1 – The Ultimate Contact Form Plugin for WordPress! ðŸš€
* Contact form with attachment support.
* Customizable email destination via the settings page.
* Customizable form labels for name, email, subject, and message fields.
* Option to enable or disable field placeholders.
* Ability to add custom CSS directly from the settings page.
* Email header and footer configuration for styling emails.
* Improved form styling including margin, padding, hover effects, transitions, and colors.
* Remove inline styles from the theme customizer options.

How to use:

  1. Install and activate the plugin.
  2. Go to the settings page in the WordPress dashboard and configure your email address, form labels, and other options.
  3. Use the Shortcode [contact_form] to display the form on any page or post.
  4. Style the form using the custom CSS box in the settings, or modify the default styles.

License

This plugin is free software; you can redistribute it and/or modify it under the terms of the GNU General Public License as published by the Free Software Foundation; either version 2 of the License, or any later version.

Plugin Homepage

For Custom CSS, visit the plugin’s homepage.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/js-contact-form directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the settings page (JS Contact Form) Under WordPress Settings to configure the form as needed.
  4. Use the shortcode [contact_form] in any page or post to display the contact form.
sections.faq:
How do I display the form?

Use the Shortcode [contact_form] on any page or post where you want the form to appear.

How do I customize the form?

You can customize the form labels, CSS, email address, and more from the plugin’s settings page in the WordPress dashboard.
sections.changelog:
1.1

  • Added a settings page for configuring email, form labels, custom CSS, and more. (2024)
  • Introduced email header and footer support.
  • Added customizable form placeholders (toggle option in settings).
  • Improved frontend form design with padding, margins, colors, transitions, and font size.
  • Developer credit section added with social media and contact links.
  • Removed inline styles from the theme customizer.
  • Fixed issues with email delivery and PHPMailer configuration.

1.0

  • Initial release of the Js Contact Form plugin with support for attachments and email validation.
  • This Plugin was First Created in 2012.

short_description: Js Contact Form with attachment support, customizable form labels, email header/footer, custom CSS, and improved design.
